ygData.subject: Building matlab interface on windows
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been using the previous matlab interface for cantera and found it very easy to setup and use.  I did encounter problems reading some mechanisms files,

I have been using the previous matlab interface for cantera and found 
it very easy to setup and use.  I did encounter problems reading some 
mechanisms files, and comments in the newsgroup suggested that these 
may now be fixed in the latest version. 

Thus, I am now trying to build the matlab interface in windows using 
version 1.3.  It appears to require ct.lib in the "cantera-1.3\lib\" 
directory (I get this from looking at buildwin.m).   I believe I need 
to build this library using the visual c++ compiler.  If this is 
correct, and since I do not have the visual c++ compiler, would it be 
possible to provide the ct.lib file? Are there any other libraries 
required to build the matlab interface?

Thanks,

Dan Flowers
LLNL
